timeline.bodyText:
Might be a bit confusing here- maybe rather:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT Defines how many chunks make up one cell in the grid used to place structures.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Defines the width in chunks of one cell in the grid used to place structures.
timeline.author: Gegy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,8 +1,29 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_5314 net/minecraft/world/gen/chunk/StructureConfig
+	COMMENT Contains parameters for placement of a single type of {@link net.minecraft.world.gen.feature.StructureFeature} during chunk
+	COMMENT generation.
 	FIELD field_24917 CODEC Lcom/mojang/serialization/Codec;
 	FIELD field_24918 spacing I
+		COMMENT Defines how many chunks make up one cell in the grid used to place structures.

replies.bodyText:
It's also the height though :-P
Should probably say dimensions (in chunks) or something similar hmmm.
replies.author: shartte

replies.bodyText:
True :P
size could potentially work here also
replies.author: Gegy

replies.bodyText: Changed it to "Defines the width and height of a cell in the structure placement grid in chunks."
replies.author: shartte

timeline.bodyText: It might help to define separation along the lines of being the minimum distance in chunks between structures
timeline.author: Gegy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,8 +1,29 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_5314 net/minecraft/world/gen/chunk/StructureConfig + COMMENT Contains parameters for placement of a single type of {@link net.minecraft.world.gen.feature.StructureFeature} during chunk + COMMENT generation. FIELD field_24917 CODEC Lcom/mojang/serialization/Codec; FIELD field_24918 spacing I + COMMENT Defines how many chunks make up one cell in the grid used to place structures. + COMMENT Each cell in the grid will receive one potential structure start. + COMMENT

+ COMMENT Minimum is 1, which means the structure will potentially be placed in every chunk. + COMMENT 2 leads to one structure per 2x2 chunks, and so on. FIELD field_24919 separation I + COMMENT Defines how varied the placement of a structure within the chunk grid (see spacing) is.

replies.bodyText: I tried to improve this javadoc and also made a comment about it effectively being a margin that is subtracted from the width/height when actually placing the structure start.
replies.author: shartte

timeline.bodyText: Underscore sucks, but while it's private, Enigma won't let me name it the same as a field in the subclass.
timeline.author: shartte

replies.bodyText:

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT The number of chunks that inersect the structures bounding box,
          
          
            
            		COMMENT The number of chunks that intersect the structures bounding box,
timeline.author: Gegy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,16 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_3449 net/minecraft/structure/StructureStart
+	COMMENT A structure start is created to describe a structure that will be generated by
+	COMMENT chunk generation. It contains a definition of its pieces and is associated
+	COMMENT with the chunk that the structure originates from.
 	FIELD field_15325 children Ljava/util/List;
 	FIELD field_15326 references I
+		COMMENT The number of chunks that inersect the structures bounding box,
